name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 26, a document from the Nanyang Women's Federation showed that the All-China Women's Federation plans to hold a "mass wedding of 10,000 people" across the country on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the National Day to guide families and young people to establish correct views on marriage, love, childbearing, and family. The newlyweds participating in the wedding must wear Chinese wedding clothes and promise not to accept gifts or hold large banquets.
